pages.text: The Multiblock Centrifuge is a powerhouse compared to the $(item)Powered Centrifuge$(). It has the capability to process Honeycomb Blocks in addition to normal honeycombs. It can also process 3 separate combs simultaneously.

pages.name: Centrifuge
pages.text: Visualize the structure to get an idea of how to build it.

To build the multiblock you will need $(or)one $(item)Centrifuge Controller$() and $(or)35 $(item)Centrifuge Casings$().$(br2)The structure size is 3x4x3 with the controller one block up from the bottom in the center of any face.
